QuestData.Title: Instant Courage
QuestData.Description: It is very bad fortune to travel mountain paths without a good guide. We grummles make the best guides, but many have run away. They fear the mountain pass now. Many good grummles disappear up there.$b$bGrummles are good at many things, but are not very brave. Maybe with fire lotus incense you can make them brave. Then they will show you the way.
QuestData.LogDescription: Inspire 3 Hiding Guides in Howlingwind Cavern to help you.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you find the hiding guides?
QuestData.RewardText: Incense works like a charm! Effects will not last long, so you must hurry!
